<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Two new columns have been introduced in Kingston for benefit plan - Offset and Duration. This fix script calculates and populates the values to be populated in these columns for benefit plans created prior to Kingston.</description>
        <name>Populate offset&duration on benefit plan</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var grBenefitPlan = new GlideRecord('benefit_plan');
if (grBenefitPlan.isValidField('offset') && grBenefitPlan.isValidField('duration')) {
	var gr = new GlideRecord('benefit_plan');
	gr.addNullQuery('offset');
	gr.addNullQuery('duration');
	gr.addQuery("tracking_type", "!=" , 'none');
	gr.query();
	while (gr.next()) {
		var benefitPlan = new BenefitPlan(gr);
		var offsetValue = benefitPlan.deriveOffsetFromStartFiscalPeriod();
		if(JSUtil.notNil(offsetValue) && offsetValue % 1 == 0 )
			gr.offset = offsetValue;
		var durationValue = benefitPlan.deriveDurationFromStartAndEndFiscalPeriod();
		if(JSUtil.notNil(durationValue) && durationValue % 1 == 0 && durationValue > 0 )
			gr.duration = durationValue;
		benefitPlan.deriveReferenceDateAndUpdate(false);
		gr.setWorkflow(false);
		gr.update();
	}
}]]></script>
